name: Custom Song Fade
description: Lets you customize the song fade of levels!

fadeIn.name: Fade In Behavior
fadeIn.description:
Customise the fade in behavior.

- Default: The default game behavior.
- Never Fade In: Fading in will be blocked.
- Always Fade In: Fading in will always happen.

fadeInFromStartPos.name: Fade In From Start Position
fadeInFromStartPos.description:
If enabled, music will also fade in when starting from Start Positions.
Fade in from a Start Position also follows the Fade In Behavior.

fadeOut.name: Fade Out Behavior
fadeOut.description:
Customise the fade out behavior.

- Default: The default game behavior.
- Never Fade Out: Fading out will be blocked.
- Always Fade Out: Fading out will always happen.
